name: Procedural Spectrum Generator
description:
Color spectrum generator that procedurally creates neat and eye-pleasing color schemes, based on the HSLuv project, a human-friendly alternative to the HSL color model. 

Use LEFT/RIGHT arrows on the keyboard to add/remove color from the spectrum, the "X" key to switch between maximum/minimum colors, "H" to hide info, and CLICK to generate a new palette.
